text: NAJ Cosfest, is an annual cosplay event held every year in the month of July at Kohima, Nagaland, India. The two-day festival is organised by the Nagaland Anime Junkies and is one of the biggest cosplay festivals in North East India. ==See also== *List of anime conventions ==References== ==External links== * @nagaland_anime_junkies on Instagram Category:Anime conventions
title: NAJ Cosfest
